```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import altair as alt

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

def preview_data(df):
    head_output = df.head()
    histogram_output = alt.Chart(df).mark_bar().encode(
      x = 'Random Numbers',
      y = 'count()'
    )
    return [head_output, histogram_output]

result = preview_data(data)
print("Head:\n:", result[0])
result[1].show()
```
